description:
考研英语一直都是很多考生比较头疼的一门科目，很多人复习起来也无从下手。为此，小编就整理出英语常考的比较级句式，方便大家的复习和积累。

1、"enough…to"的固定句式

[例句] "While we know how to tell a robot to handle a specific error," says Dave Lavery, manager of a robotics program at NASA," we can't yet give a robot enough 'commonsense' to reliably interact with a dynamic world."

2、"it occurs to sb. that..."的固定句式

[例句] When I decided to quit my full time employment it never occurred to me that I might become a part of a new international trend. 

[译文] 当我决定辞去全日制工作的时候，我未曾想到我会成为一种新的国际流行趋势的一部分。

3、插入语

[例句] But, for a small group of students, professional training might be the way to go sincewell-developed skills, all other factors being equal, can be the difference between having a job and not. 

[译文] 但是对于一小部分学生来说，职业训练也许是可取的方式，因为在其他因素同等的情况下，熟练的技术可以在得到或失去工作之间起到作用。

4、"it is time that…"的固定句式

[例句] It is time that the world learned the lessons of Aswan. 

5、"on the grounds that..."的固定句式

[例句] Railroads justify rate discrimination against captive shippers on the grounds that in the long run it reduces everyone's cost. 

6、"it isn't clear that..."的固定句式

[例句] While warnings are often appropriate and necessary - the dangers of drug interactions, for example - and many are required by state or federal regulations, it isn't clear that they actually protect the manufacturers and sellers from liability if a customer is injured. 

英语的高分秘诀就在于平时的积累，每天还要花一定的时间用在英语词汇上，相信英语会取得理想分数，大家加油。

title: 2017考研：英语常考比较级句式（三）
